title: Barron Buff that makes the turrets Strong and defense
body: What if Barron Buff made turrets op well that would be good becasue if your losing just get baron buff and let the turrets do all the work. Baron buff gives you everything 500g, Winions, more ap or ad etc  but what happens if barron step it up a notch and made turrets so good that all u do is last hit. What happens if the turrets with baron buff got more damage health or something extra that riot put i hope you like this. :) im just a kid

replies.body: It is BECAUSE it already does everything else that it doesn't need another power boost.

If you are that far behind that even with baron minions, and the extra gold and stats from baron the enemy is able to push into your base, then they have obviously played better than you and one baron steal should not be able to reverse that.
